name: As a Super Admin I will be the only user
description: that is able to see & access the Change FEIN Feature.

elements.name: Setup site, employer, and benefit application

steps.name: a CCA site exists with a benefit market
benefit market catalog exists for enrollment_open initial employer with health benefits
there is an employer ABC Widgets
initial employer ABC Widgets has enrollment_open benefit application

elements.name: HBX Staff with <subrole> subroles should <action> Change FEIN button

steps.name: that a user with a HBX staff role with Super Admin subrole exists and is logged in
the user is on the Employer Index of the Admin Dashboard
the user clicks Action for that Employer
the user will see the Change FEIN button

elements.name: Setup site, employer, and benefit application

steps.name: a CCA site exists with a benefit market
benefit market catalog exists for enrollment_open initial employer with health benefits

steps.name: that a user with a HBX staff role with HBX Tier3 subrole exists and is logged in
the user is on the Employer Index of the Admin Dashboard
the user clicks Action for that Employer
the user will see the Change FEIN button

steps.name: a CCA site exists with a benefit market

there is an employer ABC Widgets
initial employer ABC Widgets has enrollment_open benefit application

steps.name: that a user with a HBX staff role with HBX Staff subrole exists and is logged in
the user is on the Employer Index of the Admin Dashboard
the user clicks Action for that Employer
the user will not see the Change FEIN button

name: As a Super Admin I will be the only user
description: that is able to see & access the "Extension of Open Enrollment" Feature.

elements.name: Setup site, employer, and benefit application

steps.name: a CCA site exists with a benefit market
benefit market catalog exists for canceled initial employer with health benefits
there is an employer ABC Widgets
initial employer ABC Widgets has canceled benefit application

elements.name: HBX Staff with Super Admin subroles should actionExtend Open Enrollment button

steps.name: that a user with a HBX staff role with Super Admin subrole exists and is logged in
the user is on the Employer Index of the Admin Dashboard
the user clicks Action for that Employer
the user will see the Extend Open Enrollment button
the user clicks Extend Open Enrollment
the user clicks Edit Open Enrollment
the user fills out the Extend Open Enrollment form with a new date
the user clicks the Extend Open Enrollment to submit the form
the user should see a success message that Open Enrollment was successfully extended

name: As a Super Admin I will be the only user
description: that is able to see & access the "Force Publish" Feature.

elements.name: Setup site, employer, and benefit application

steps.name: a CCA site exists with a benefit market
benefit market catalog exists for draft initial employer with health benefits
there is an employer ABC Widgets
initial employer ABC Widgets has draft benefit application

elements.name: HBX Staff with <subrole> subroles should <action> Force Publish button

steps.name: that a user with a HBX staff role with Super Admin subrole exists and is logged in
the system date is less than the earliest_start_prior_to_effective_on
the user is on the Employer Index of the Admin Dashboard
the user clicks Action for that Employer
the user will see the Force Publish button

name: Hbx Admin creates a New Consumer Application for ivl users

elements.name: Setup site, employer, and benefit application

steps.name: a CCA site exists with a benefit market

elements.name: Hbx Admin navigates into the new consumer application with paper application option and goes forward till DOCUMENT UPLOAD page

steps.name: the FAA feature configuration is disabled
a Hbx admin with super admin access exists
Hbx Admin logs on to the Hbx Portal
creates a consumer with SEP
the person enrolls in a Kaiser plan
I click on purchase confirm button for matched person
I should see pay now button

elements.name: Setup site, employer, and benefit application

steps.name: a CCA site exists with a benefit market

elements.name: Hbx Admin navigates into the new consumer application with paper application option and goes forward till DOCUMENT UPLOAD page

steps.name: the FAA feature configuration is disabled
a Hbx admin with tier 3 access exists
Hbx Admin logs on to the Hbx Portal
creates a consumer with SEP
the person enrolls in a Kaiser plan
I click on purchase confirm button for matched person
I should see pay now button
